column4: I need help with a Pyhthon script, trying to make a auto-mated screipt to re-connect me whenever our ISP tries to remind us that we owe on the bill [witch we don't] The code and error here: http://paste.ubuntu.com/20451/
I don't know about tkinter, but wouldn't you generally need to create a window for the button and label first?
#python would be a better channel anyway
anyway, I suggest you go ask on #python :)
